q: Mike Pence denounced such tactics after the campaign, writing in an essay titled "Confessions of a Negative Campaigner" that "negative campaigning, I now know, is wrong." It is wrong, quite simply, to squander a candidate's priceless moment in history, a moment in which he or she could have brought critical issues before the citizenry, on partisan bickering, Mike Pence wrote in 1991.
